HomePageHero.name: Mahdi Pakravan
HomePageHero.description: Whether you're looking for web development, AI solutions, or professional mentorship, I'm here to help with innovative design, secure development, and expert guidance in both web and AI technologies.

ShowcaseSection.title: What I Do
ShowcaseSection.description: I specialize in creating modern, efficient, and scalable solutions for web and mobile applications.

development.title: Full-Stack Development
development.description: Building robust and scalable applications using modern technologies and best practices.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Creating responsive and interactive web applications with cutting-edge frameworks.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Developing cross-platform mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

services.heading: My Services
services.description: I believe it's my duty to share my knowledge and experience in both web development and AI with you. In this section, I offer services for those passionate about these fields. You can also download my resume below to learn more about me.

websiteDevelopment.title: Web Development Training
websiteDevelopment.description: If you'd like a private tutor to learn web development, I can help you. Just send me a message on Telegram, and we can discuss your learning path.

websiteDesign.title: AI Development & Consultation
websiteDesign.description: Need help with AI implementation or have questions about AI development? I can assist you with AI solutions, model development, and integration.

websiteSecurity.title: Project Development
websiteSecurity.description: Whether it's a web project or an AI solution, I can help! I assist with all phases of development, including design, coding, maintenance, and security. Just click the button below.

websiteMentorship.title: Mentorship
websiteMentorship.description: In this mentorship program, you can ask anything about web development, AI, your career path, resume reviews, or mock interviews. Just click the link on the website.

FeedbacksSection.title: Feedbacks
FeedbacksSection.description: Your feedback means the world to me. Here, you'll find reviews from my clients and collaborators who have shared their experience working with me.

feedback.comment: Mahdi has a very deep knowledge of Frontend Development and making websites. I worked with him, and he is fantastic. I highly recommend Mahdi!
feedback.name: Mo.Ali Ali Panah

PortfolioSection.description: In this section, you can explore some of the projects I've worked on and the results achieved with my clients. Each project tells a unique story, and by clicking on them, you can learn more.

ContactMeSection.name: Name
ContactMeSection.loremText: If you have any questions or want to start a new collaboration, I'm always ready to get in touch. You can reach out to me via the form below, and I'll respond as soon as possible. Whether it's about a new project or seeking advice, I'd be happy to collaborate with you and turn your ideas into reality.

CareerSection.title: Career Journey
CareerSection.description: Explore my professional journey and experience in the world of web development.

AIBlogSection.title: Machine Learning from My Perspective
AIBlogSection.description: Explore the latest insights, tutorials, and discoveries in artificial intelligence
AIBlogSection.stayUpdatedDescription: Get the latest AI insights delivered to your inbox

svmModel.title: Machine Learning from My Perspective (Step 16 - SVM Model)
svmModel.description: In this exercise, we will learn what the SVM (Support Vector Machine) model is, how and where to use it, and also hyperparameters.

logisticRegression.title: Machine Learning Made Simple (Step 15 - Logistic Regression Model)
logisticRegression.description: In this exercise, we will learn what Logistic Regression is, how it works, where to use it, and also hyperparameters.

imbalancedData.title: Machine Learning from My Perspective (Step 14 - Imbalanced Data)
imbalancedData.description: In this step, we handle imbalanced data that we have for regression or classification.

classification.title: Machine Learning from My Perspective (Step 13 - Classification)
classification.description: In this article, we get familiar with the concept of classification and build a test model to check if emails are spam or not.

californiaHousing.title: Machine Learning Made Simple (Step 12 - California Housing Project)
californiaHousing.description: In this article, we perform all Data Preparation steps on the California housing dataset and finally predict with linear regression model.

featureSelection.title: Machine Learning Made Simple (Step 10 - Feature Selection)
featureSelection.description: In this section, we learn exactly which features to select and which ones to remove to achieve our desired result.

featureScaling.title: Machine Learning from My Perspective (Step 9 - Feature Scaling)
featureScaling.description: In this section of the articles, we bring our features to a suitable numerical range to get closer to the final preprocessing stages.

featureEngineering.title: Machine Learning Made Simple (Step 8 - Feature Engineering)
featureEngineering.description: In this section, we engineer the features of our dataset and prepare it for machine learning.

gradientDescent.title: Machine Learning from My Perspective (Step 7 - Gradient Descent)
gradientDescent.description: What exactly is gradient descent and how is it implemented, simple explanation with image and code.

regression.title: Machine Learning from My Perspective (Step 6 - Regression)
regression.description: In this step, by drawing regression, we learn to visualize the relationship between our data and make our first predictions.

FooterSection.description: Focusing on the discipline, colors, and emotions of your brand, I create solutions that not only reflect your values but also provide an unforgettable experience for users, whether it's web development or AI implementation.
FooterSection.copyRight: Web Development + AI Development + Security with ❤ by Mpakravan

about.heading: About me
about.description: I’m a frontend engineer who blends motion, accessibility, and performance to craft interfaces that feel alive. I focus on clean architecture, thoughtful animations, and maintainable design systems.
